name: afro
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a style for curly hair, particularly Black people's hair, in which it is allowed to grow naturally into a thick, rounded shape: In his youth he had an Afro. I think he looks good with an afro.
More examplesFewer examplesHe no longer wore the big shades and the Afro.The singer first grew his afro at the age of ten.When he took his hat off a huge ginger Afro emerged.He was about 6 foot tall and had the curliest afro I've ever seen.
